name: Challenge from the Black Cat
description:
.

Monetization through video distribution using this game on YouTube and other media is permitted.
We would appreciate it if you could include a link to the Steam store page in the video summary section when you distribute it!


Story.

A lonely cat left out of the pack by a territorial dispute.

While he was spending his days in solitude, a black boss cat appeared in front of him.

The boss cat challenged him to a challenge.

Can the lonely cat overcome the challenge?
